ts
namespace Csp {
	type ActionSource = 'strict-dynamic' | 'report-sample';
	type BaseSource =
		| 'self'
		| 'unsafe-eval'
		| 'unsafe-hashes'
		| 'unsafe-inline'
		| 'wasm-unsafe-eval'
		| 'none';
	type CryptoSource =
		`${'nonce' | 'sha256' | 'sha384' | 'sha512'}-${string}`;
	type FrameSource =
		| HostSource
		| SchemeSource
		| 'self'
		| 'none';
	type HostNameScheme = `${string}.${string}` | 'localhost';
	type HostSource =
		`${HostProtocolSchemes}${HostNameScheme}${PortScheme}`;
	type HostProtocolSchemes = `${string}://` | '';
	type HttpDelineator = '/' | '?' | '#' | '\\';
	type PortScheme = `:${number}` | '' | ':*';
	type SchemeSource =
		| 'http:'
		| 'https:'
		| 'data:'
		| 'mediastream:'
		| 'blob:'
		| 'filesystem:';
	type Source =
		| HostSource
		| SchemeSource
		| CryptoSource
		| BaseSource;
	type Sources = Source[];
}
